metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26691 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in Security Update 2022-003 Catalina, macOS Monterey 12.3, macOS Big Sur 11.6.5. An application may be able to gain elevated privileges.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-26691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
cups-bsd - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
cups-client - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
cups-common - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
cups-core-drivers - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
cups-daemon - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
cups-ipp-utils - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
cups-ppdc - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
cups-server-common - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
libcups2 - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
libcupsimage2 - 2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.3op2-7ubuntu2.1').
